body_html: Right. It all depends on what kind of consistency you're expecting. If it's some kind of slowly moving guidance based on successive losses, it might be ok to have a delay of a few batches.

body: Right. It all depends on what kind of consistency you're expecting. If it's some kind of slowly moving guidance based on successive losses, it might be ok to have a delay of a few batches.
